abstract.title: Introduction
abstract.para: The OGSA-DAI User's Guide provides general end user-oriented information.

chapter.title: Using OGSA-DAI
chapter.para: Please see the documentation available in the OGSA-DAI distribution.

chapter.title: Troubleshooting
chapter.para: Please check with the Administration Troubleshooting section for some common errors encountered with OGSA-DAI. More information will also be available from the OGSA-DAI web site (http://www.ogsadai.org.uk).
